## 1. Social Media & Brand Awareness Campaign

*Role*: Marketing Officer  

*Problem*  
The company needed improvement in social media engagement and consistent messaging.

*What I Did*  
- Created and scheduled digital contents  
- Coordinated marketing and communication with the team.     
- Suggested small improvements such as better task sequencing and clearer responsibilities and ensured visual consistency.    

*What I Learned*  
I learned the ways to plan and schedule digital content effectively, which eventually help me understand the role of consistency to improve the social media engagement. Working closely with the marketing team enhance my communication and coordination skills. It made me realized how small process improvements such as organizing tasks more clearly and defining responsibilities will  make the team work more efficiently. Moreover, I gained a better understanding of visual consistency and its impacts on unified brand messaging.

</div>

## 3. Applying Marketing Segmentation

*Course*: Marketing Management  
*Type*: Short written assignment  

*Context*  
I analyzed a consumer product using basic segmentation concepts.

*What I Did*  
- Described the product and its benefits  
- Defined a target market using demographic and psychographic factors.   
- Suggested a possible positioning statement and simple digital channels to reach this audience.    

*What I Learned*  
I learned how segmentation and positioning help marketers focus their message on a specific group instead of trying to appeal to everyone at once.
